name: todo-chat
description: A simple todo chat app, using natural-language-commander

scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run sass-build
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.budo: budo src/app.ts:app.js --live --open --dir ./dist -- -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ] -t [ stringify --extensions [ .html ] ]
scripts.browserify: browserify src/app.ts -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts .ts ]  -t [ stringify --extensions [ .html ] ] -o dist/app.js
scripts.sass-dev: npm run sass-build && node-sass src/app.scss dist/app.css --watch --include-path src

author: whenther
